Actions.Name: Shadow Clone
Actions.Description: Summon a shadow clone in a free space in range 3. Clones disappear at the end of combat or if the Shinobi is defeated.

Summons.Name: Shadow Clone
Summons.Effects: Foes adjacent to a shadow clone at the start of their turn take [fray] damage from the clone.

Actions.Name: Shadow Swap
Actions.Description: The Shinobi swaps places with a shadow clone, teleporting.

Actions.Name: Huton
Actions.Description: The Shinobi ignites a roaring fireball in range 4 as a blast 2 area effect. Characters inside must save or take [D]+[fray], or just [fray] damage on a successful save. The area continues to rage as a firestorm and becomes dangerous and difficult terrain for the rest of combat, or until this ability is used again.
